title: Question:
author: Alpha1980
content: Hi all Is anyone interested in a bot that trades on binance futures paying out 1.2/1.8% daily paid out in Bitcoin or usdt

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: Alpha1980 on March 13, 2023, 09:14:06 AMHi all Is anyone interested in a bot that trades on binance futures paying out 1.2/1.8% daily paid out in Bitcoin or usdt first of all you written wrong title, you are so hurry to postand you are not following rules this forum,ths type of one word title are not allowed write title which anyone can understand without clicking on it

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Alpha1980 on March 13, 2023, 09:14:06 AMHi all Is anyone interested in a bot that trades on binance futures paying out 1.2/1.8% daily paid out in Bitcoin or usdt Paying out 1.2/1.8% daily?Too good to be true. As far as I know, there is no trading bot or trading strategy that I have a cross that generates guaranteed daily profits. Why do i feel this might turn out to just be some ponzi scheme?

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: What's with the specific number for profits? 1.2 and 1.8% are really odd numbers to choose from. If you want a catchy marketing slogan, I think "more than 1% daily profit" is a better term. Without the guaranteed promise of course, unless your product is just a ponzi.Everybody is definitely interested in a good tool to make daily trading easier. If your software is built properly, it will definitely have its use. But if it is just a scam tool, you'll probably get a ton of negative feedback/trust. Try to share the code for the basic version, then you can gradually build a premium one. Going open source is a good idea, especially when there are many open-source tools available that do more or less the same thing without any shady promise.
